column2: "Watchin' that really cheered me up! You gave them a real beating, killer!"
"For real, it helped a lot. Now I see that when I'm surrounded, I just gotta man up and go for it!"
"You cut those Darkers' numbers down and taught me a lesson on top! Great work, killer!"
"Thanks a bunch! Just you watch, I'll be tearin' through them as fast as you do soon!"
